problem_text_cn: 亮亮同学为了参加兰州市第十届中小学生艺术节,用纸板制作了一个圆锥形纸帽,如图所示,它的底面半径OB=9,高OC=12．若不计损耗,则这个圆锥形纸帽的侧面积是()
problem_text_en: In order to participate in the 10th Lanzhou Primary and Middle School Students' Art Festival, Liangliang made a cone-shaped paper hat out of cardboard. As shown in the picture, its bottom radius OB = N_0 and high OC = N_1. If the loss is not included, then the lateral area of ​​the conical paper cap is ()
